pasta.repository

Class ResultDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • pasta.repository.ResultDAO

  • public class ResultDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Access Object for Results.

    This class is responsible for all of the interaction between the data layer (disk in this case) and the system for assessment results.

    Since:
    2012-11-16
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Alex Radu

      • ResultDAO

        public ResultDAO(AssessmentDAO assDao)
        loads up all of the latest results
        Parameters:
        assDao - for linking the results with their respective assessments. This is done to allow modifications to the assessment to dynamically change the marks.

                                    Assessment assessment,
                                    java.lang.String assessmentDate)
        Get the assessment result for a particular user, for a particular assessment, for a particular date
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        assessment - the assessment (needed for lookup and linking)
        assessmentDate - the date of the submission
        Returns:
        the assessment or null if it does not exist

      • updateUnitTestResults

        public void updateUnitTestResults(java.lang.String username,
                         Assessment assessment,
                         java.util.Date runDate)
        Update unit test results If the result is the latest, reload it from file. Otherwise ignore it (it will get loaded later)
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        assessment - the assessment (needed for lookup and linking)
        runDate - the date of the submission

        Parameters:

        filename - the name of the file being written

      • updateCalculatedCompetitionResults

      • getCalculatedCompetitionResult

        public ArenaResult getCalculatedCompetitionResult(java.lang.String competitionName)
        Get the results of a calculated competition.

        Not sure if this method returns the proper thing since calculated competitions should't reutnr arena results

        Returns:
        the results of the competition, null if no results are available
